data.text: @GovDanMcKee @RIHEALTH @CDCgov Who cares about the CDC guidance. The CDC has lost all credibility. I hoping that during the next election cycle there is a serious house cleaning and that  real leadership will come forward to investigate the crimes that were perpetrated against the citizens the past two years.

@GovDanMcKee @RIHEALTH @CDCgov ...Thank you Dr. Alexander-Scott. While this imbecile of a Governor ran you out of town some of us know we did as well as we did because of you. He is too stupid to know it, but some of us are not.

@GovDanMcKee @RIHEALTH @CDCgov ... RIers owe Dr. Alexander-Scott a debt: 

#1 in vaccinations at 80.8%
https://t.co/KowgV9VKRA

And most important of all, #2 in fewest deaths per 100k population:

https://t.co/AQOBQvWg6Y

@GovDanMcKee @RIHEALTH @CDCgov Let's the truth out. Dr. Alexander-Scott's departure was a resignation of conscience. And those who have any knowledge of how these things work know her nearly 50k a month was an arrangement set by her lawyer. What did you do to her Danny boy to cost the state that? Here is...
